com.stabilit.scm.cln.call
Interface ISCMPCall

All Known Implementing Classes:
SCMPCallAdapter, SCMPCallAdapter.SCMPGroupCall
public interface ISCMPCall

The Interface ISCMPCall. Basic functionality of a SCMPCall.

Author:
JTraber
